entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 08:54 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 97.1 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
